name: Summer Festival
description: Join us for tri-Pride’s Summer Festival at Willow River Park in Kitchener, ON. This family-friendly event features a vibrant vendor market with community organizations, businesses, and food trucks. Enjoy the Kid’s Zone with activities for kids or enjoy the many live performances from our local artists. Celebrate love, community, and PRIDE with us, and help us continue to grow and improve our events with your feedback. Don't miss out on this exciting day of celebration and community spirit!
